page.title: 04CLUBS IN KINGS NORTON
page.content: There are a lot of {clubs} held locally. One of the places where they meet is the Saracen's Head on Kings Norton Green.Some of the {clubs} are Karate, twice a week,Slimming,keep-fit There are {meetings} for children such as cubs, scouts,brownies and guides. There is also a{Community Centre} by Kings Norton Park and another one by Primrose Hill School.So in the area there are lots of places that hold {clubs} for all ages from young to old. Lots of people enjoy going to their {club} {classes} every week. Sometimes the over 60's {club} meets in our school for a concert. By Stuart Smith, Kings Norton Primary School.
